Text: another classic sir..anupam kher is another great actor..proud to see all these films uploaded by you

Malikjee4,

i am fan of your torrents... i almost downloaded all the torrents uploaded by you...

its a gem collection of old hindi movies which are rare to find on net for free... 

Truly..salute to your hard work and passion to provide these movies to us.....  

Also, we request you to upload Gharonda and Mohan Joshi Hazir ho. 

Sir, we r waiting for these movies from years... hope u'll fulfill our requirement...

Thanks a ton...

cant thank you enough man..u have really brought alive an entire era for this generation and shown them wat cinema is all about..
thanx malik jee
You have a great collection, malikjee! I wonder if you cud upload Rajnigandha if you can find it..it's a really wonderful movie and I havent seen it since I was a kid.

Thanks for uploading these wonderful old classics... keep on the good work... 
Could you find 'GAMAN' 1978 by Muzzafar Ali?
Thanks Sirjee..
